name: Emotional Energy Map
description:
Ever ask the question to your teammates or peers, “How are you feeling?” and receive a general response such as, “I’m fine.”?


Use this template with to help teammates articulate emotions they are feeling and help them reflect on how their work is making them feel this way.


You can also go one step further to map out where in the emotional energy map they’d like to be and steps on how you might work together to get there.


Adapted from Ted Chiasson’s talk at Remote Design Week 2021

Based on the Mood Meter framework by Marc Brackett
